name: Arctic Traveler
description:
Explore Arctic environments as various forms of water. Made by Jordan Peterson, Cody Lyle-Durham, and Christian Hartman.

Controls:

Icy Caverns

  • [W] - move forward 
  • [S] - move backwards
  • [Space] - slow down
  • [A] - rotate left 
  • [D] - rotate right 
  • [R] - reverse direction
  • [Tab] - enlarge or shrink minimap

Stark Skies

  • [Space] - move forward
  • [A] - rotate left
  • [D] - rotate right
